EmailTemplate.name: 17.Nuage.XLE.webXLE.L.G.N.8227.XLE Gamechanger.Email Asset 4
EmailTemplate.subject: The TCO of moving to the cloud. Get the paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Why moving to the cloud pays off Analysis says… a private cloud can reduce TCO 25% over five years Migrating your legacy IT environment to a private cloud architecture might seem more than a little daunting. Should you do it and will the investment be worth it?
Read our white paper, Moving from a legacy to a cloud environment, for insights on the major costs of migration, total cost of ownership improvements and return on investment of a private cloud. Enjoy the read.
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
